tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AnalysisData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    structured_data JSONB,
    unstructured_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE combined_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doc_id UUID,
    foreign_key INT,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    document JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE comprehensive_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    structured_id INT,
    unstructured_id INT,
    analysis_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (structured_id) REFERENCES structured_data(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (unstructured_id) REFERENCES unstructured_data(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (analysis_id) REFERENCES analysis_results(id)
);
